title: Navigate to Landing Page
description: Verify that the landing page loads successfully and displays all key elements.
preconditions: User has internet connection and browser is open.

steps.action: Navigate to the landing page URL
Verify the HJP logo is visible
steps.expected_result: The logo is displayed in the header

steps.action: Verify the page title 'Henri-John Plaatjies' is visible
Verify the subtitle 'Senior Test Automation Engineer' is visible
steps.expected_result: The subtitle is displayed below the title

steps.action: Verify the 'View Showcase' button with diamond icon is visible
steps.expected_result: The button is displayed and clickable

steps.action: Verify the Explorer panel is visible
steps.expected_result: The file explorer is displayed on the left side
